ad_text: Legacy Express Trucking Sponsored 🚛 Flatbed Drivers! 🚛 We're always looking for new drivers to join our award-winning team. Legacy Express Trucking Sponsored "Legacy Express Trucking VS The World" What started as a small trucking company whose "office" was literally inside of a semi-truck has grown quite a lot in the last few years. We turned 10 last week, and now, this once small company is expanding to locations all over the United States. Are you CDL driver who wants to be a part of something special? Do you want to be a part of the growth first hand? We take care of our people. We're building careers. We offer great pay, great benefits, and a wide array of work options for our drivers. This might just be the opportunity of a lifetime for you. To learn more, check out the link below. https://legacyexpress.net/trucking-careers/apply-for-career/ #trucking #truckerslife #truckers #trucker #truck #semitrucks #employment #jobopportunity #applyhere #work #truckingindustry #truckdriver #truckingjobs #truckinglife #trucks #working #hardwork #needajob #shipping #cargo #CargoServices #shippingavailable Legacy Express Trucking Apply now

Legacy Express Trucking Sponsored What's a career in trucking like, really? There's no one better to discuss the ups and downs of a career in trucking than our CEO, Isaac. Legacy Express Trucking Sponsored Trucking is a huge industry. We know it, you know it. But at the same time, each truck driver, dispatcher, and person involved with a trucking company is just one person. That’s why at Legacy we’re just as concerned about the quality of our employee's lives as we are with the sheer size of our business. The result of this careful introspection is an overall better trucking company with happier employees. Our business is a family, and we’ll never keep you from yours. #trucking #truckerslife #truckers #trucker #truck #semitrucks #employment #jobopportunity #applyhere #work #truckingindustry #truckdriver #truckingjobs #truckinglife #trucks #working #hardwork #needajob #shipping #cargo #CargoServices #shippingavailable Legacy Express Trucking Apply now
